title: Bug 101187: Localization key can't be blank when adding
description:
Bug 101187: Localization key can't be blank when adding.

Description: If the key is left blank, the externalized text cannot be displayed in the chart.
OB: When adding a new localization key with a blank entry, externalized text is not displayed in the chart.
EB: Externalized text should still be displayed in the chart even when the localization key is left blank.
SR:
Steps to reproduce:
1. Set a localization key for the chart's externalized text.
2. Try adding a new localization key with a blank entry and observe if the externalized text is still displayed in the chart.
